member.name: T:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources.board
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream similar to System.IO.MemoryStream.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources.opening
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream similar to System.IO.MemoryStream.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources.revealandboard
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream similar to System.IO.MemoryStream.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources.rolfe
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources.theme
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream similar to System.IO.MemoryStream.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.My.Resources.Resources.whammy
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream similar to System.IO.MemoryStream.

member.name: T:WindowsApp1.AudioFile
member.summary: This class is a wrapper for the Windows API calls to play wave, midi or mp3 files.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor: Location is the filename of the media to play. Wave files and Mp3 files are the supported formats.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Play
member.summary: Plays the file that is specified as the filename.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Pause
member.summary: Pause the current play back.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Resume
member.summary: Resume the current play back if it is currently paused.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Stop
member.summary: Stop the current file if it's playing.

member.name: M:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Close
member.summary: Close the file.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Wait
member.summary: Halt the program until the .wav file is done playing. Be careful, this will lock the entire program up until the file is done playing. It behaves as if the Windows Sleep API is called while the file is playing (and maybe it is, I don't actually know, I'm just theorizing). :P

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Milleseconds
member.summary: Sets the audio file's time format via the mciSendString API.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Status
member.summary: Gets the status of the current playback file via the mciSendString API.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.FileSize
member.summary: Gets the file size of the current audio file.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Channels
member.summary: Gets the channels of the file via the mciSendString API.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Debug
member.summary: Used for debugging purposes.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.IsPaused
member.summary: Whether or not the current playback is paused.

member.name: P:WindowsApp1.AudioFile.Filename
member.summary: The current filename of the file that is to be played back.
